payload.description:
For business, please contact: pewpew.studio.vn@gmail.com

Retune to Vietnam to carry on the life journey of a streamer, Hoang Van Khoa (Pewpew) along with his partners have founded a home-based studio name Pewpew Studio.

Having worked as a streamer/caster for DOTA 2/LOL/PUBG since his return to Vietnam, I also hosted very first Dota 2 Vietnam tournament with tickets sold on Valve system - (Vietnam Champion League) with over 5,000 tickets sold! Highest number till today!

Also I was working as Community Manager for Talktv - Streaming Platform during 2014 till 2017.
Community Manager for Nvidia Vietnam (Graphic card Department) from 2015 till 2017
Creator/Talent for Creatory (A Korean Entertainment Company based in HCM city) 

I also run 2 bread shop in HCMC "Banh mi PewPew"

And now ^^ Well I am just selling breads everyday and play/stream some games during nights ^^
